casebody.data:
99-0430 (La. 4/1/99)

Reginald BROWN v. Bill SEIMERS, et al., J.T. Hill (Intervenor). No. 99-C-0430. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Hill, J.T.; — Third Party(ies); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of St. John Baptist 40th Judicial District Court Div. “C” Number 23736; *557to the Court of Appeal, Fifth Circuit, Number 98-CA-0694

Denied.

CALOGERO, C.J. not on panel.
